All functions

arnold_get()

Get Arnold Foundations/Arnold Venture awards

arnold_standardize()

Standardize Arnold Foundations/Arnold Venture award results

awardFindR grant search

Search Carnegie awards

carnegie_standardize()

fedreporter_standardize()

gates_standardize()

Standardize award results from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation

macarthur_standardize()

mellon_get()

Search the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation grant database

mellon_standardize()

Standardize award results from Mellon

neh_get()

Grab the NEH grants data and loop the keyword queries

neh_standardize()

Standardize NEH results

nih_get()

Search NIH RePORTER

nih_standardize()

Standardize NIH RePORTER results

nsf_get()

Search the NSF API for awards

nsf_standardize()

Standardize NSF search responses

ophil_get()

Grab the Open Philanthropy grants data search for keyword-date combos

ophil_standardize()

Standardize the Open Philanthropy grants search

osociety_get()

Query and scrape Open Society foundation awards

osociety_standardize()

Standardize Open Society foundation awards

request()

Make an HTTP request

rockefeller_standardize()

rsf_standardize()

rwjf_standardize()

sloan_standardize()

Search SSRC fellowships and grants by keyword and date

Extract details from SSRC webpage entry

substr_right()

Substring from the right

Search for a set of keywords in the Templeton grants database.

templeton_standardize()

text_hash()

Return basic text hash *NOT* cryptographic!! this is a toy hasher!
